translations.Your Zimbra session has expired, please: Your Zimbra session has expired, please re-authenticate in your user settings.
translations.Zimbra integration into Nextcloud provid:
Zimbra integration into Nextcloud provides a dashboard widget for unread emails,
 one for upcoming events, a search provider for emails and the ability to search for Zimbra contacts in Nextcloud.

Nextcloud will suggest your Zimbra contacts addresses when you search for a contact via the top-right contacts menu
or when you search for someone to share a file to.
translations.You can get a Zimbra pre-auth key by run: You can get a Zimbra pre-auth key by running "zmprov generateDomainPreAuthKey domain.com"
translations.A pre-auth key is required to refresh ex: A pre-auth key is required to refresh expired user sessions when 2FA is enabled on your Zimbra server.
translations.Failed to save Zimbra admin options: Failed to save Zimbra admin options
translations.Warning, everything you type in the sear: Warning, everything you type in the search bar will be sent to Zimbra.
translations.Enable navigation link (link to your Zim: Enable navigation link (link to your Zimbra instance in the navigation menu)
translations.Failed to get Zimbra upcoming events: Failed to get Zimbra upcoming events
